subject: Re: [junit] Objects
msgSnippet: Please post code. Thanks. ... J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software Services Let s write software that people understand.
messageBody:
Please post code. Thanks.

>So said Augusto Cesar Castoldi on 2003-08-10 --------------------
>Hi...
>
>In my test class, I have an attribute. I init this in setUp()
>
>I'm trying to test a method of a class, that modifies my attribute, this
>attribute is passed by parameter of the methos.
>
>Why the test don't reconize the changes made in the object outside of
>the TestCase class?
>
>If i execute the test using na "public static void main" (Application),
>it works perfect.
>
>Thanks,
>
>Augusto
